content.rendered:
HOLIDAY PARTY LOOKS

Happy Holiday season to all my beautiful clients, friends, family, and followers! Since it’s Thanksgiving this month I just want to say I’m grateful for each and every one of you. I can’t believe that 2018 is almost over…but I’m extremely excited for the New Year 2019! The Holiday season means we get to be festive and dress up. The ’80s trend keeps exploding with beautiful statement earrings, dresses/tops with bold decorative shoulders, and color. I especially love adding bold reds and mixing and matching pastels.

1: Both Earrings and red Saint Laurent bag from FWRD.COM 2: Lash Extensions Appointment Click Here (Book Early For The Holidays). 3: Find The Perfect Beauty Gifts and/or A Gift For Yourself. 4: Shop D’Lashes Beauty Here. 5: Both Looks From FWRD.COM

LOVE DIONNE
